products.hablalo_desc: Háblalo: Free app designed to assist people with communication disabilities. It offers adaptable tools so that the person can communicate and actively participate in different contexts of daily life. It doesn't require an internet connection and is available for Android and iOS.

faq.title: Tell me, what would you like to know?

hablalo.title: Here are some frequently asked questions.
hablalo.download: To download it, access your device's app store (App Store or Play Store), search for Háblalo and press the download button. Once installed, it's ready to use.
hablalo.functionality: Háblalo includes different functions adapted to various communication needs: CHAT: Converts what you say into text and what you write into voice. CARDS: Facilitates communication through simple images. SHORTCUTS: Allows you to use pre-configured short phrases. PHRASES: Combine cards or shortcuts to create complete sentences.
hablalo.cards: Using 'Cards' is recommended to facilitate interaction through images. It's ideal for people with cognitive challenges, who can't read or write, or who have reduced mobility.
hablalo.shortcuts: The Shortcuts function allows for faster communication with pre-established phrases. It's useful for people who can read but need support to express themselves easily. It also streamlines interaction for people with reduced mobility.
hablalo.chat: The Chat module converts text to voice and voice to text. It's ideal for people with fine motor skills who can write. It also includes automatic translation, and benefits those with dysphonia, unintelligible speech, voice loss, or deafness.

training.title: Inclusive Training: Training for service teams, HR, and teachers. Face-to-face or virtual modality.

basic_training.content:
Our basic training includes:

- Introduction to inclusion and accessibility
- Understanding different disabilities
- Basic inclusive communication tools
- Best practices for interacting with people with disabilities

advanced_training.content:
Our advanced training includes:

- Deep dive into accessibility standards
- Technical implementation of accessibility solutions
- User testing with people with disabilities
- Creating accessibility policies for organizations

leader_training.content:
Our leadership training includes:

- Inclusion strategy development for executives
- Building an inclusive organizational culture

modalities.content:
We offer different modalities for our training programs:

- In-person: At your facilities
- Live virtual: Via videoconference
- E-learning: Through our platform
